FUNCTION.NAME: FN_GENERATE_ID

FUNCTION.COMMENT: This function is called to generate the ID.

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_FORMNAME
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain DD_OBJECT_TYPE value of related form

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_ID_NAME
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain ID name as created in AppsInfra, eg. ISSUE_ID/ACTION_ID

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_PID
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain process instance id and should be null

TAG.COMMENT: I_Formname contain DD_OBJECT_TYPE value of related form
I_Id_Name contain ID name as created in AppsInfra, eg. ISSUE_ID/ACTION_ID
i_pid contain process instance id and should be null

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_EVENT_LOG_ID
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain apps infra generated event log id

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_EVENT_NAME
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain event name [supported values are, 1: GET_ISM_TEMPLATE: to retrieve issue xml blank template 2: TRIGGER_ISSUE: to create an issue]

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_SUBSCRIPTION_NAME
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain subscription name as taken from ms_apps_event_subscription table based on selected event id

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_STATUS
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: contain status of business event run

ARGUMENT.NAME: O_NOTIFY_EVENT_OWNER
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Success or Error flag is returned

ARGUMENT.NAME: O_ERROR_CODE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Error Code returned by the procedure

ARGUMENT.NAME: O_ERROR_MESSAGE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Error message returned by the procedure

TAG.COMMENT: i_event_log_id contain apps infra generated event log id
i_event_name contain event name [supported values are, 1: GET_ISM_TEMPLATE: to retrieve issue xml blank template 2: TRIGGER_ISSUE: to create an issue]
i_subscription_name contain subscription name as taken from ms_apps_event_subscription table based on selected event id
i_status contain status of business event run
o_close_subscription Close subscription code is returned
o_notify_event_owner Success or Error flag is returned
o_error_code Error Code returned by the procedure
o_error_message Error message returned by the procedure
